content: *this small felted coin purse is a great introduction to felting lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70193a corrections applied skill level beginner level 1 lion® wool article #820 1 ball 158 yards *shown in pumpkin* *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm 1 wooden toggle button sewing needle and thread project is felted before assembly search for more lion brand make it yours purse 1 patterns on ravelry *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/search#pattern=make%20it%20yours%20purse&view=captioned_thumbs&website=lionbrand com&sort=name
